english.segment1: I should have seen those signs all around me, But I was comfortable inside these wounds;. So go ahead and take another piece of me now. While we all bow down to you;
english.segment2: You tear me down and then you pick me up, You take it all and still its not enough, You try to tell me you can heal me, But Im still bleeding and youll be. The death of me!
english.segment3: How can you end my affliction. If youre the sickness and Im the cure?. Too long Ive faked this addiction, Another sacrifice to make us pure;
english.segment4: You tear me down and then you pick me up, You take it all and still its not enough, You try to tell me you can heal me, But Im still bleeding and youll be. The death of me!
english.segment5: You tear me down and then you pick me up, You take it all and still its not enough, You try to tell me you can heal me, But Im still bleeding and youll be. The death of me!
english.segment6: I wont forget;. I cannot forget this;. I wont forget;. Ill never forget this;. I wont forget;. I cannot forget this;. I wont forget;. Ill never forget this;
english.segment7: I wont forget!. I cannot forget this!. I wont forget!. Ill never forget!
english.segment8: You know I can never prove this solution;. You arent the one that I thought you were;. And so I learn to embrace this illusion, The line that separates- it starts to blur;
english.segment9: You tear me down and then you pick me up, You take it all and say its not enough, You try to tell me you can heal me, But Im still bleeding and youll be. The death of me!
english.segment10: And youll be the death of me!
